value.title: 2 ways to create a radial bar chart in  Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video I am going to show you 2 ways to create a radial bar chart in Power BI. One, we will use the visuals available in Power BI to fake one and the second method we will use charticulator to create our own and make it easier. value.title: DAX Fridays! #77: GROUPBY, CURRENTGROUP
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays, we will go through the DAX function GROUPBY with an example.  GROUPBY is similar as SUMMARIZE, but the difference is that in the expression part, you use DAX iterators to get your results. You can also nest GROUPBY functions to get for example the highest sales amount by country.
